Name: LU 718 - Zoning, EBENEZER PLAZA, Brooklyn (C170189ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 170189 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 718).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - September 7, 2017

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Greenfield and Richards\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on July 14, 2017 its decision dated July 12, 2017 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by Brownsville Linden Plaza, LLC,\expndtw-6  \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 17d, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the development of two new 11-story mixed-use buildings containing approximately 531 affordable dwelling units in the Brownsville neighborhood of Brooklyn, (ULURP No. C 170189 ZMK), Community District 16,\cf1  \cf0\expndtw-4 Borough of Brooklyn \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 170190 ZRK (L.U. No. 719), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area; \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on July 27, 2017;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the revised negative declaration issued July 10, 2017 (CEQR No. 17DCP088K), which includes an (E) designations to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality and noise (E-419) (the \ldblquote Revised Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 170189 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision with the following modification:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri72 Matter in \strike strikeout\strike0  is old, to be deleted by the City Council;\par
Matter \ul underline\ulnone  is new, to be added by the City Council.\par
\pard\ltrpar\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 17d:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sb11\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li880\ri157\qj\tx880\expndtw-17\f0 1.\tab\expndtw0 changing\expndtw-17  \expndtw0 from\expndtw-14  \expndtw0 an\expndtw-14  \expndtw0 M1-1\expndtw-14  \expndtw0 District\expndtw-14  \expndtw0 to\expndtw-14  \expndtw0 an\expndtw-14  \expndtw0 R7A\expndtw-15  \expndtw0 District\expndtw-14  \expndtw0 property\expndtw-19  \expndtw0 bounded\expndtw-14  \expndtw0 by\expndtw-19  \expndtw0 New\expndtw-13  \expndtw0 Lots\expndtw-14  \expndtw0 Avenue, Powell Street, a line 150 feet northerly of Hegeman Avenue, Sackman Street, a line 100 feet northerly of Hegeman Avenue, \ul and \ulnone Christopher Avenue\strike , Hegeman Avenue, and Mother Gaston\expndtw-6  \expndtw0 Boulevard\strike0 ;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri157\qj\tx880\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li880\ri157\qj\tx880\expndtw-17 2.\tab\expndtw0 changing from an M1-1 District to an R7D District property bounded by a line 100 feet northerly of Hegeman Avenue, Sackman Street, a line 150 feet northerly of Hegeman Avenue, Powell Street, Hegeman Avenue, and Christopher\expndtw-17  \expndtw0 Avenue;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sb11\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li880\ri157\qj\tx880\expndtw-17\f0 3.\tab\expndtw0 establishing\expndtw-13  \expndtw0 within\expndtw-11  \expndtw0 a\expndtw-12  \expndtw0 proposed\expndtw-11  \expndtw0 R7A\expndtw-12  \expndtw0 District\expndtw-11  \expndtw0 a\expndtw-12  \expndtw0 C2-4\expndtw-11  \expndtw0 District\expndtw-11  \expndtw0 bounded\expndtw-11  \expndtw0 by\expndtw-16  \expndtw0 New\expndtw-9  \expndtw0 Lots\expndtw-11  \expndtw0 Avenue, Powell Street, a line 150 feet northerly of Hegeman Avenue, Sackman Street, a line 100 feet northerly of Hegeman Avenue, \ul and \ulnone Christopher Avenue\strike , Hegeman Avenue, and Mother Gaston Boulevard\strike0 ;\expndtw-7  \expndtw0 and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sb11\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li880\ri156\qj\tx880\expndtw-17\f0 4.\tab\expndtw0 establishing within a proposed R7D District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 100 feet northerly of Hegeman Avenue, Sackman Street, a line 150 feet northerly of Hegeman Avenue, Powell Street, Hegeman Avenue, and Christopher\expndtw-17  \expndtw0 Avenue;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated March 20, 2017, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-419, Community District 16, Borough of Brooklyn. \cf1\par
\cf0\par
Adopted.\par
